The EncryptaGuard Mission

Professional security, engineered for the family home.

In a world where families are targeted by identity thieves and ISPs sell your browsing habits, your standard router is your biggest vulnerability. EncryptaGuard provides a physical isolation model that blocks trackers and threats before they ever reach your children's tablets or your smart home devices.

Our architecture utilizes dedicated Protectli Vault hardware running a hardened security layer. By processing data on-premise, we eliminate the latency of cloud-only filters, delivering a browsing experience up to 3x faster while ensuring your family's data never leaves the building.

Transparency & Trust: EncryptaGuard is built on a foundation of open, industry-standard tools. We use outbound-only management tunnels to keep your internal network invisible to the public internet. No ports are ever opened on your home firewall, keeping your household private.

Architected by a U.S. Army Veteran with 15+ years of Network Defense experience.
